entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Wet flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
